results.content: I like the short videos, very topic specific.  Instructors explains his demonstrations very well, speaks at a good rate and doesn't move around too fast.  I'm able to keep up with him while also working on my files at the same time.  I've tried some other courses and find this one much more learner friendly than others.

results.content: Great tutorial for beginners. It gives a good into to the html structure, and how tags and elements are used. Sometimes it's good to know why something is done, not only how it is done. Exactly what I was looking for. Thanks!
